Thank you to

 from MND Connect who spoke at out Coffee Afternoon about the work she and the team do supporting people living with and affected by #MND. The helpline is staffed by a highly experienced, knowledgeable, dedicated team.

MND Connect Helpline | MND Association
If you are living with MND, a family member or carer supporting someone with MND or a HSCP you can contact our MND Connect helpline on 0808 802 6262.
